Class Window

java.lang.Object
java.awt.Component
java.awt.Container
java.awt.Window
java.awt.Frame
javax.swing.JFrame
Window
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.event.MouseListener, java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, java.util.EventListener, javax.accessibility.Accessible, javax.swing.RootPaneContainer, javax.swing.WindowConstants
public class Window
extends javax.swing.JFrame
implements java.awt.event.MouseListener
This class will display the game, manage inputs using GUIs, and record the best records.
See Also:

    • compareAndUpdateBestRecords

      public boolean compareAndUpdateBestRecords​(java.lang.String curTime)
      compare the previous best record and the current record the player go. if the player got a new best record, it will be updated.
      Parameters:
      curTime - the record the player got.
      Returns:
      true if the player has a new best record.
